title.rendered: Essel Mining Industries Limited collaborates with Smile Foundation on a Healthcare Project

content.rendered:
A look at Essel Mining’s collaboration with Smile Foundation

In a country where securing quality medical care remains a distant dream for many, Smile on Wheels, supported by Essel Mining Industries Limited, is making a difference. This initiative brings primary healthcare services directly to underserved communities through Mobile Medical Units.

During the reporting period, these units regularly visited Angul of Odisha and Singrauli of Madhya Pradesh, delivering primary health treatments and diagnosing various illnesses. A standout feature of this Smile on Wheels project is its commitment to health education, providing awareness sessions that encourage better health practices within the community.

Since the project’s inception, approximately 63,000 people have received vital healthcare services, reflecting the project’s ongoing impact and dedication to improving health outcomes for those in need.

Essel Mining Industries Limited collaborates with Smile Foundation on a Healthcare Project

In a country where a significant majority of the population struggles to fulfill their basic needs, accessing quality medical care remains an elusive dream. Smile on Wheels is dedicated to bridging this gap by providing healthcare solutions to the destitute and their communities through its transformative Mobile Medical Unit.

Essel Mining Industries Limited in collaboration with Smile Foundation is providing healthcare facilities through mobile medical units making frequent visits to Angul, Odisha, and Singrauli, Madhya Pradesh, ensuring essential primary healthcare services for the community. The dedicated team of healthcare professionals provided effective treatment to all members of the community, addressing various illnesses and diseases through timely diagnoses and comprehensive care.

Smile on Wheels goes beyond merely offering medical treatment. One of its key objectives is to disseminate vital information on health issues through awareness sessions, thereby empowering the community to adopt healthier lifestyles and seek appropriate healthcare when needed. By promoting health-seeking behavior, Smile on Wheels aims to create a lasting impact on the overall well-being of the community.
